column3: To clarify: my GCC does not consider this to be a VLA, but at least some Clang versions do.
Well I think this makes the code clearer too, so it's a win in any case.
5c8fd508112016c3821b71112270afe83e6949ac gives same binaries with recent gcc on my arch.\n\nutACK 5c8fd508112016c3821b71112270afe83e6949ac
